transcript.text: Shalom this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries I just wanted to
film a brief testimony I think will
encourage and inspire people out there
I've had this hope and dream for several
weeks now I've wanted to become a
Republican delegate for Trump here in
Oregon and to go to the National
Convention in fact I've been a huge
volunteer of the Trump campaign here in
Portland and I got on a list to get an
application those applications should be
going out soon now that the Oregon
primary is over and I even checked the
schedule for the national convention in
Cleveland and it happens during the week
doesn't happen on a Shabbat so
everything seemed to be perfect and then
last night I found out that the state
convention which is what you have to go
through first before you get to the
national convention that unfortunately
it happens on a Shabbat it happens on a
Shabbat here in Oregon and you know
there's going to be buying and selling
their there's going to be people you
know it's a building where there's going
to people that's are going to be paid to
bring in food and all sorts of stuff and
I just can't do that not on a Sabbath
day and so I had to contact the Trump
campaign and also the Republican Party
and basically tell them look I'm sorry I
won't be able to do this because the
Shabbat is more important than Trump in
fact not just the Shabbat but but all of
y'all's work Yahshua himself who is the
word clothed the flesh he's the most
important of anything oh it's hard
though when you have something that you
really think is going to be good and in
a learning experience and something
that's positive but even then if it
doesn't line up with yas word you got to
let it go yeah always comes first in
every single way he's always first and
he's always the very first priority in
our lives and should be so I don't know
if any of you've seen this movie came
out years and years ago called chariots
of fire but it's about this man who was
a mazing runner but he refused to run on
the Sabbath now of course he thought the
Sabbath was on Sunday and he was wrong
the ship odds on the seventh day the
week Friday sundown to Saturday sundown
but his heart was in the right place he
truly wanted to honor yon put him above
everything else and if you watch that
movie you'll find out how blessed he
became so when we put yah when we put
his word
wonderful beautiful commandments which
are more precious than silver and more
costly than gold we put that first we
put him first Yahshua HaMashiach he will
bless us and I'm trusting that more
blessings will come out of me you know
sacrificing training for this hopefuls
this desire of mine in order to honor
him and honor his Commandments so I
encourage you out there that you have a
similar situation like that make sure
even if it's something that's might be
good or wonderful if it's coming against
ya his word make sure you follow him and
not what maybe you think might be the
best thing to do alright this is the
angle John Lee before restoration
industries website is ww spirit and tour
com Shalom and yah bless
